entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
